Madison.James B. Bowen House: The James B. Bowen House (also known as the Seth Van Bergen House) is a historic house located at 302 South Mills Street in Madison, Wisconsin. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on March 1, 1982. One of Madison's oldest surviving sandstone houses, it is a prime example of well executed masonry construction that flourished in Madison during the 1850s and 1860s.
